post.body: Awesome!!!
From Realtor.com; a florida agent
I have to wonder the same thing, unless it was a foreclosure. In that case, I wonder how the bank felt
Well said.
Going to bed. G'night Twitter and Facebook. Busy day tomorrow. Busy week in fact. 3,600 miles of traveling next week.
Back from Disney and everyone is exhausted.....except for Evan. He got to ride in the stroller all day and has plenty of energy.
Getting ready to go on Mission Space at Epcot
EPCOT: Every Person Comes Out Tired
I made the mistake of telling Evan that we are going to see a train today. Now he is chasing Bella around saying "Ella...a Foo Foo!"
When I was a Disney cast member, we used to tell people that EPCOT means Every Paycheck Comes On Thursday
Evan seems to be over the worse part of his fever.We are off to Disney's EPCOT this afternoon. Experimental Prototype Community of Tomorrow.
Really? Another messy kitchen photo taken by an agent who didn't think twice about it. http://tinyurl.com/a8s4cz
Looked at some today. After looking at the pricing on homes and new homes in the Orlando area I can safely say it is a great time to buy.
Just got back from eating 4 dozen raw oysters with my father in law
Evan's fever seems to have gone down a bit. We may check out some homes in the community of Independence in Winter Garden, FL.
3:07am: Nicole woke me up because Evan seems to have a fever. I'll be going to the store in the morning for Motrin & a cool mist humidifier
So tired of real estate agents taking stupid photos. Here's one of many I've seen tonight. http://tinyurl.com/a3bl9q
Just got back to Orlando
Just ate at Sal's Italian restuarant in Jupiter, FL. Awesome lunch for $5.99
Making, returning, receiving lots of phone calls today. And I thought I had one more day to get caught up before the craziness began again.
